bibl.title: P. Lond. inv. 2175: A Full Edition.
bibl.note: Full text of P. Lond. Inv. 2175, parts of which were published by Harold Idris BELL, Zu den Kaiserreskripten: An Addendum, ArchPF 7 (1924) pp. 223-224 [never incorporated into the S.B.]. Application to a strategus of the Oxyrhynchite Nome, including copies of letters to and from the deputy-archidikastes. After 3.xii.217. - Pp. 181-182: Appendix. A list of érxidikasta€ which supplements the list of these officials in P. Theones, Appendix 'B'. <archidikastai>
SIJPESTEIJN P.J. and K.A. WORP, P. Lond. inv. 2175: A Full Edition.
